import React from 'react'; import Header from './Header.js' import Main from './Main.js' import Footer from './Footer.js' class App extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { isEditProfilePopupOpen: false, isAddPlacePopupOpen: false, isEditAvatarPopupOpen: false } } handleEditAvatarClick() { this.setState({isEditProfilePopupOpen: !this.state.isEditProfilePopupOpen}) } handleEditProfileClick() { document.querySelector('.popup_profile').classList.add('popup_opened') } handleAddPlaceClick() { document.querySelector('.popup_new-card').classList.add('popup_opened') } render() { return( <>
